Connect Chromium.description: Attaches Playwright to an existing Chromium instance

Launch Chromium.description: Creates a Chromium instance and attaches Playwright to it

Launch Chromium Server.description: Creates a Chromium server instance the client can connect to

Connect Firefox.description: Attaches Playwright to an existing Firefox instance

Launch Firefox.description: Creates a Firefox instance and attaches Playwright to it

Launch Firefox Server.description: Creates a Firefox server instance the client can connect to

Connect Webkit.description: Attaches Playwright to an existing Webkit instance

Launch Webkit.description: Creates a Webkit instance and attaches Playwright to it

Launch Webkit Server.description: Creates a Webkit server instance the client can connect to

browser.contexts.description: Returns an array of all open browser contexts

browser.close.description: Closes the browser and all of its pages when it's launched, or clears all created contexts belonging to this browser and disconnects from the browser server when it's connected to

browser.isConnected.description: Indicates that the browser is connected

browser.newPage.description: Creates a new page in a new browser context

browser.on('disconnected').description: Emitted when the browser gets disconnected from the browser application

browserContext.close.description: Closes the browser context including all of its pages

browserContext.cookies.description: Returns all cookies of the browser context

browserContext.newPage.description: Creates a new page in the browser context

browserContext.pages.description: Returns all pages of the browser context

browserContext.route.description: Modifies the network request that made by any page within the browser context

browserContext.unroute.description: Removes registered route of a page withing the browser context

browserContext.on('close').description: Emitted when the browser context is closed (manually or when the browser application is crashed)

browserContext.on('page').description: Emitted when a page is created within the browser context

browserServer.close.description: Closes the browser and makes sure the process is terminated

browserServer.kill.description: Kills the browser process and waits until the process exits

browserServer.on('close').description: Emitted when the browser server is closed

page.$.description: Finds a matching element by a query selector within the page

page.$$.description: Finds all matching elements by a query selector within the page

page.$eval.description: Finds a matching element by a query selector within the page and passes the result as the first argument to a function

page.$$eval.description: Finds all matching elements by a query selector within the page and passes the results as the first argument to a function

page.bringToFront.description: Actives the corresponding tab of the page

page.click.description: Clicks in the center of an element within the page

page.content.description: Returns the full HTML contents of the page

page.dblclick.description: Clicks twice in the center of an element within the page

page.emulateMedia.description: Emulates a given CSS media feature or type within the page

page.evaluate.description: Evaluates a function in the page context

page.fill.description: Focuses an input element within the page and inserts to it the given value

page.focus.description: Focuses an element within the page

page.goBack.description: Navigates to the previous page in the history

page.goForward.description: Navigates to the next page in the history

page.goto.description: Navigates the page to a URL

page.hover.description: Hovers over the center of an element within the page

page.pdf.description: Generates a PDF from the page

page.pause.description: Pauses Playwright script execution when in headed mode

page.press.description: Focuses an element within the page and presses on a specific key

page.route.description: Modifies the network request that made by the page

page.screenshot.description: Generates a screenshot of the page

page.type.description: Focuses an element within the page and sends keyboard events for each character in the text

page.unroute.description: Removes registered route of the page

page.waitForEvent.description: Waits until an event within the page is fired

page.waitForFunction.description: Waits until a predicate within the page returns a truthy value

page.waitForLoadState.description: Waits until the required load state of the page has been reached

page.waitForNavigation.description: Waits until the page navigates to a new URL or reloads

page.waitForRequest.description: Waits until a request by URL/predicate is resolved

page.waitForResponse.description: Waits until a response by URL/predicate is resolved

page.waitForSelector.description: Waits until an element by selector in the page satisfies the state option

page.on('close').description: Emitted when the page is closed

page.on('console').description: Emitted when a script within the page calls one of console API methods

page.on('dialog').description: Emitted when a dialog appears in the page

page.on('domcontentloaded').description: Emitted when the `DOMContentLoaded` event of the page is dispatched

page.on('frameattached').description: Emitted when a frame within the page is attached

page.on('framedetached').description: Emitted when a frame within the page is detached

page.on('framenavigated').description: Emitted when a frame within the page is navigated to a new url

page.on('load').description: Emitted when the `load` event of the page is dispatched

page.keyboard.down.description: Dispatches a `keydown` event within the page

page.keyboard.press.description: Presses on a specific key within the page

page.keyboard.insertText.description: Dispatches an `input` event within the page

page.keyboard.type.description: Dispatches `keydown`, `keypress`/`input` and `keyup` events within the page for each given character

page.keyboard.up.description: Dispatches a `keyup` event within the page

page.mouse.click.description: Clicks on area within the page by coordinates

page.mouse.dblclick.description: Clicks twice on area within the page by coordinates

page.mouse.down.description: Dispatches a `mousedown` event within the page

page.mouse.move.description: Dispatches a `mousemove` event within the page

page.mouse.up.description: Dispatches a `mouseup` event within the page

page.on('pageerror').description: Emitted when an uncaught exception happens within the page

page.on('popup').description: Emitted when the page opens a new tab or window

page.on('request').description: Emitted when the request is issued by the page

page.on('requestfinished').description: Emitted when a request finishes successfully

page.on('response').description: Emitted when a response is received

page.on('worker').description: Emitted when a dedicated `WebWorker` is spawned by the page

Examples - basic.description: Creates a basic usage example of a page

body: // Drags the mouse from a point
// Drops the mouse to another point
Examples - drag and drop.description: Creates an example that drags the mouse from a point and drops it to another point
